menu_items.name: Sys.Executable
menu_items.description: This will install to Windows and Linux with default options. MacOS has a custom option.

command: import os, sys; f = open(r'__WIN_OUTPUT_FILE__', 'w'); f.write(sys.executable); f.close()
win.description: Note how __WIN_OUTPUT_FILE__ is using raw-strings. Otherwise the backslashes are not properly escaped.
